text: The Gaucho War () is a 1942 Argentine historical drama movie directed by Lucas Demare and was based on the 1905 novel of the same name by Leopoldo Lugones. It stars Amelia Bence, Enrique Muiño, Dora Ferreiro, Ángel Magaña, Sebastián Chiola, Ricardo Galache. ==Other websites== * Category:1942 drama movies Category:1940s historical movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Lucas Demare
title: The Gaucho War
